revised_title: Symbiotic Relationship Between Astrosclera Willeyana and a Degenerate Alga
tldr: The author investigates 47 specimens of Astrosclera willeyana and discovers a unique symbiotic relationship between the sponge and a degenerate alga. The sponge captures and envelops algal spores, secreting aragonite layers around them, forming a supplementary skeleton. This relationship is considered a true symbiosis rather than parasitism.
